subject: Return Order SSN4916
description_text:
Hello I am trying to return my pedals. Unfortunately they do not fit on my
rig. My order is SSN4916.

Best,

Alec Turung

conversations.body_text: Hi Alec Turung,  Please take a photo so we can confirm which bracket it is.
Hi Alec Turung,  Would it be possible to secure it by drilling mounting holes? We’ve had customers using the ARTX bracket before, and they reinforced it by drilling holes as well.

Both of the frames are metal I would have to drill through the metal I
don't have a drill for that.

On Tue, Jan 13, 2026, 12:06 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Alec Turung,     You can add two 2020 aluminum profiles to your current bracket/setup—this will usually make the installation and mounting easier and more secure.
